info.description: Backend API for Pondok Pesantren K3 Arafah Website.
info.title: K3 Arafah Web API

post.description: Create a new achievement entry (admin only)

get.description: Retrieve list of all admin users

post.description: Create a new admin user (Super Admin only)

delete.description: Delete an admin user by ID

put.description: Update password for an admin user (Super Admin only)

get.description: Get all articles with optional pagination
Get a single article by its URL slug
Get a single article by its ID

post.description: Submit a new message from contact form
Create a new gallery album (admin only)

delete.description: Delete a single photo from a gallery (admin only)

get.description: Get a single gallery with all its photos

delete.description: Delete a gallery and all its photos (admin only)

post.description: Upload multiple photos to a gallery (admin only)

get.description: Check the health status of the API and its dependencies

post.description: Login with username and password to get JWT tokens

put.description: Mark a message as read (admin only)

post.description: Register a new santri for PSB (public)

get.description: Get all PSB registrants with optional status filter (admin only)

parameters.description: Filter by status (PENDING, VERIFIED, ACCEPTED, REJECTED)
parameters.name: status

get.description: Get a single registrant's detail (admin only)

put.description: Update the status of a registrant (admin only)
Verify a registrant and accept them as santri (admin only)

get.description: Check if the service is ready to accept traffic

post.description: Use refresh token to get new access token
Upload an image file to Cloudinary (max 5MB, JPEG/PNG/WebP/GIF only)
Create a new video entry (admin only)

get.description: Get a single video by its ID (admin only)
